pr_title: Refactor integration tests creating domain in PV to use methods from CommonTestUtils

timeline.message:
Using different ports instead of starting at default 30000, at times when
there is a delay in getting an unused port and using it.

Refactored the ItDomainInPV, ItIntrospectVersion and
ItConfigDistributionStrategy test classes

timeline.bodyText: fw.close() call is missing in the refactored code. Not sure if it is intentional.

replies.bodyText: Yes that is intentional. The try-with-resource will auto close the resource regardless of if there is a exception thrown or not.
